startInfo: Connecting to the network and switching servers is fairly straight forward. Connect to the network using:
If this is your first time logging in you will default to the survival server. To switch to the other servers, use the following commands:

general: /warp - Takes you to the warp location
/statue create - creates a staue of the playername

skyblock.name: Sky Block
skyblock.subtitle: Aquatic Season
skyblock.desc: Placeholder text for the Sky server. This text snippet is displayed on both the home page and the server page.
featInfo: You find yourself marooned on an island in the sky with just a cow and a chest of strange items. Don't fall! Moo!
startInfo: Connecting to the network and switching servers is fairly straight forward. Connect to the network using:
If this is your first time logging in you will default to the survival server. To switch to the other servers, use the following commands:

general: /is  -  Create a new island or return to your island
/is settings - Change what visitors can do on your island
coop: /island coop <player> - Gives a player temporary full access to your island
/island expel <player> - Removes coop status. Also ejects player from your island.
team: /island invite - Invite a player to join your team. You can only invite one person at a time
/island accept or reject - Accepts or rejects an invite. If a player has an island already and accepts, the island will be deleted
/island team - lists info on the team
/island leave - leave the team - returns to spawn
/island kick <name> - only available for the island owner or leader - removes a team member
/island makeleader <name> - Transfers ownership to a team member. Can only be issued by the leader
/island teamchat - enables players to chat only to team members
